movie.title: Aftermath
movie.plot: A fatal plane crash changes the lives of Roman and Jake forever. Roman loses his wife and daughter in the accident, while Jake loses his mindâ€”as he happens to be the air traffic controller who failed to avert the nightmare. Rage and revenge engulfs Roman and Jake finds himself swamped with guilt and regret.

events.title: Bashkirian Airlines Flight 2937 and DHL Flight 611 collide in mid-air
